app_descript:
App Name: My Talking Tom 2
App Package Name: com.outfit7.mytalkingtom2

Brief:

Join the lovable virtual pet, Tom, in "My Talking Tom 2" as you explore new worlds, care for his adorable pets, and engage in a myriad of interactive activities! This vibrant sequel provides endless entertainment with more personalization, mini-games, and adventures. Experience the joy of nurturing Tom and watch him grow in a dynamic environment.
